comment:
Heyy kiddo. U r this cocoon of positive energy with an infectious smile. Be the dreamer and believer u are. U r destined to achieve great things, bhai. Keep in touch, even if u become a hot-shot, wealthy and a genius philanthropist. 
PS: 120 mins is not 1 hour 20 mins. Keep 'vibing', Mr. Gentleman.
name: Anup Kumar Gupta

comment: Nischit, We share a very unique bond not explainable in words. The on and off times we had that just made us stronger and better . Somehow you made me the man I am today.. Always there for you in your highs and lows, be my partner in reaching greatest heights. Lots of love ✨✨
name: Satwik Vankayalapati

comment: You are a true adventurer 🧭 - always seeking new thrills and experiences 🤩 Trouble seems to follow you 💥 but you always find a way out 💡Your loyalty and warmth make you a cherished friend to all of us 💕
name: Parth Bhore

comment: Caring, helping, rich kid (a little dumb). Flat m bkc karna, late night masti karna, ghumna, bitching karna, gaali khana😂. Had so much fun with you, 317 ki har bkc m sath tha tu, wo to aage blr m bhi krenge. Phone ka use kam kiya kar🤫. All the best for your future, baaki blr m tabahi macha denge🔥
name: Sanskar Verma

comment: From that english intro line to becoming my 4a.m. friend,iss raaste me maar-peet, rona,chillana, aur wapas phle se bhi ache dost banna tha, par tujhpe gussa to mai aage bhi hoti rhungi.Mujhe jhelne ka, support krne ka, and dosti nibhaane ka talent to hai tumme🥰. Hamesha aise hi rhna(fasna mat bas)
name: Khushi Verma

comment: Nischitttt.... Hi!! After hanging out with us the line "Ameer baap ki BIGDI AULAD" fits you perfectly. Always up for fun, whether it be teasing Parth or talking nonsense abt future. A great mediator (sometimes), & knows how to settle things and even add fuel to the fire 😜. JK. LOVE YOU BRO! ❤️ (platonic)
name: Priyansh Jaseja

comment: A really fun local-but-clueless banglorian guy who is perfect balance of calm and crazy 🤪 ur famous thumke could definitely win the Jhalak Dikhla Ja show. Apart from this, he is really caring and understanding. Blr m mst maze krte h. I wish you all the happiness 🤗 and seize the opportunity!
name: Kirtika Zanzan

comment: Nishu Baby! He who accomplishes all the goals which he decides upon, by hook or by crook. A caring and fun loving guy, who is always in search of good vibes😊. Glad to have you and always there for you. All the best!
name: Bhavya Contractor

comment: You and the group helped me in times no one else did, thank you and wish you the best. Also I'll annihilate you in TT someday.
name: Mir Razee Mohideen

comment: People often miss the face behind  that easygoing smile. You are the perfect balance of delulu and solulu. Nischit is calm, composed and is a supportive and unbiased listener. The little worries, the subtle flexes, the wild aspirations, u are a full package. I m jealous of you visiting BANFF! ATB!❤️
name: Abhijit Panda

comment: You never know whats up in his mind, a fantastic person to play Co-op with and go for shopping to the heart's content. Filling his closet with most expensive experiences, he could very well be the humblest. If you find yourself saying "Taste kaha hai" just add this animal to your trip, Fox29 clutch!
name: Nilay Ganvit

comment: Calm, friendly, & a very sweet person, Love how our friendship started with Anime, a fellow weeb who actually watches all those underrated animes. Ur sense of responsibility is very admirable, when u r very concerned about gettin all us back to campus at 12 PM in city🤣.  All the best fr ur future
name: Aayushi Choubey

comment: One of the few people who underwent a complete transformation in college, evolving from a simple, calm boy to a smart, confident individual. Best wishes for the future, let's stay connected.
name: Amit Kumar Makkad

comment: Very calm and  humble person with caring attitude who makes everyone feel included. Had fun time talking with you and during events, outings. Bangalore explore krwana ab tu🙃. Best wishes for future!!
name: Kanchi Pardhi

comment: IITISoC Mentor. Got to learn a lot from you, thank you for guiding me!
name: Krish Agrawal

comment: Hey Nischit, cheers to all the times I met you in the FSZ. It was fun watching you pull all-nighters high on caffeine. You are such a jolly and talented person. I wish we had more time chatting (about anime ig 👀), and thanks for being so accommodating the little times we did. ATB bro !!
name: Hasnain

comment: Hello bhai, your positive vibe is awesome and contagious. It's been fun solving DSA questions with you; you have helped me a lot. Thank you, Nischit, and all the best 😊.
name: Ashutosh Dhamaniya

comment: Friendship started with TT wished you were a better student xd. A really sweet and simple guy.  Fun to spend time with. All the best and keep in touch!
name: Chirag Goel
